87661.「この先のドラクロン山地は 魔物も強く\n 道も険しいため 立ち入りを禁じている:
Beyond this point is Draklon Mountains; because of
the strong monsters and rugged roadways, entry is
forbidden. If you value your life, you won't approach.

87663.「賢者ルシェンダさまから 連絡は受けている。\n 門は開けておいたから 自由に通:
I received contact from Sage Lushenda. This gate has
been opened, so you may freely pass.

87666.「ドラクロン山地の飛竜を 手懐けたと聞いたぞ。\n そのような偉業を 成しとげる:
I heard that you tamed a flying dragon from Draklon
Mountains. That's quite the achievement; you certainly
are the Hero's Guiding Ally.
